timeline.message:
(CDAP-16784) Improve kryo serialization for Schema

- Properly traversing the Schema structure for serialization instead of using json string to reduce the serialized size

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense to add a unit test that checks the size of the serialized object to make sure we dont regress later on?
timeline.author: MEseifan

replies.bodyText: It would be kind of flaky though (e.g. if kryo version upgrade, the size might be different).
replies.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: We could make it a bit fuzzy, like >10% change would cause a failure. But it might eventually become flaky anyway, so we can omit that for now
replies.author: MEseifan
